info.title: Read grouping information of a grouped, partially checked checkbox

setupScript.name: moveFocusToFirstCheckbox
setupScript.description: sets focus on the first checkbox
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on the first checkbox
testPageDocument.querySelector('[role="checkbox"]').focus();

user: When focus is on a checkbox, read its grouping information.
instructions.raw: When focus is on a checkbox, read its grouping information.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.
